The check-in experience is very good, mainly in the following aspects
1. Although the room is small in size, the layout is very reasonable, and you donâ€™t feel aggrieved when you stay in it
2. The bed is very comfortable
3. There is no strange smell in the room like ordinary hotels
4. Good breakfast
5. The surrounding environment is very good, it can be regarded as a relatively modern area in Beijing
